import React from 'react' import india from '../assets/india.png' import luf from '../assets/luf.jpeg' import emi from '../assets/emirates.png' import indgo from '../assets/indigo.jpeg' const DispFlights = (props) => { const arr = []; for(let i =0; i<25; i++){ arr.push({company: String.fromCharCode(i+97), number: i+97}) // console.log(String.fromCharCode(i)) } const imgs = [emi, indgo, india, luf] // console.log(arr) {/*
    {arr.map((flight) => (
  • {flight.company + " "+flight.number}
    • ))}
*/} const rand = (min, max) => Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min)) + min; return (
  →  



{date}
{arr.map((flight) => (
{names[flight.number%4]}

Price{" : " + rand(200, 1000) + "$"}

enter
)) }
) } export default DispFlights
